_comments.agents: Create one entry per Dropwizard application to be monitored
_comments.host: REQUIRED: the host/ip of the Dropwizard application to be monitored
_comments.appName: Optional: Dropwizard application name to display within New Relic dashboard UI (defaults to 'host')
_comments.adminPort: Optional: port /metrics and /healthcheck requests are serviced from (defaults to 8081)
